item.title: By: אשכול הכופר
item.dc:creator: אשכול הכופר
item.description:
From Shadal to Steinsaltz; they tended to share Hertz view.
Steinsaltz? please, where? Normally, I think of him as dogmatic 'reluctantly' wearing the guise of the enlightened. Thanks!
